content.body: TabAtkins: Can you do a new pip release for Bikeshed? So I can get the https://github.com/tabatkins/bikeshed/pull/2134 change included
content.formatted_body: TabAtkins: Can you do a new pip release for Bikeshed? So I can get the https://github.com/tabatkins/bikeshed/pull/2134 change included

content.body: I do need an actual updated pip release to get that, right? Just doing `bikeshed update` doesn’t pull it in
content.formatted_body: I do need an actual updated pip release to get that, right? Just doing bikeshed update doesn’t pull it in
